title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Teacher Competency Enhancement and Collaboration Promotion

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and fundamental understanding of mathematics education
context.additional_context: Aimed at enhancing teachers' professional development and collaborative competencies in the post-pandemic educational environment, it incorporates mobile-based micro-learning modules with real-life applicable content.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for designing classes using collaboration tools with over 80% accuracy in mobile environments.
Learners can exchange substantive feedback with peer teachers at least three times through a digital platform and develop strategies for lesson improvement.
Learners can specify and present five or more adaptive teaching strategies to enhance student engagement in mathematics instruction.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
